p: Students in grades 5 to 9 enrolled in were selected by purposive sampling to ensure representation of diverse characteristics relevant to our study. Inclusion criteria for students were as follows: (1) enrolled in the “Sailing through Adolescence” course and (2) had demonstrated the ability to read and write. Exclusion criteria for students were (1) absent from four or more classes of the “Sailing through Adolescence” course and (2) had been identified as having a mental disorder. In this survey, sample size calculation for ±1% precision levels, a confidence interval of 95%, and P = 0.5 was determined to be 9,604 ( 14). Considering the 10% churn rate, 10,564 participants were needed.
